description:
Sadistic driver Izumi Murata and masochistic passenger Nagisa Suzuki are the Tsukuba Girls High School team. Izumi treats Nagisa like a slave, but she follows her commands without a single complaint. However, due to the distance between them, the two are staying at separate inns. One night Nagisa has a strange dream: she and Izumi have switched positions.
Source: crunchyroll
